abilities.name: Nether Blast
abilities.description: Deals magical damage in an area, affecting both enemies and structures.

abilities.name: Decrepify
abilities.description: Turns a unit ethereal, rendering it immune to physical damage but more vulnerable to magical damage. Also slows the unit's movement speed.
abilities.notes: Can be cast on allies to protect them from physical damage or on enemies to make them vulnerable to magical damage.

abilities.name: Nether Ward
abilities.description: Summons a ward that damages nearby enemy heroes when they cast spells, based on the mana spent.
abilities.notes: Deals damage when enemies cast spells within its radius.

abilities.name: Life Drain
abilities.description: Channels a beam of energy at a target, draining its health and transferring it to Pugna.
abilities.notes: Can be cast on allies to heal them. When cast on self, restores mana instead of health.

innate_abilities.name: Oblivion Savant
innate_abilities.description: Allows Pugna to cast abilities while channeling.
innate_abilities.notes: Pugna can cast other abilities while channeling Life Drain.
